definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (connexion with above √ not clear; LXX Mageddw, Mekedw, Magedw, etc.; Vulgate Mageddo; As. Magadû, Magidû COT:Gloss Dl:Pa 287) old Canaanitish city, assigned to Manasseh 1Ki 4:12, 1Ki 9:15, 2Ki 9:27, 2Ki 23:29, 2Ki 23:30; ´[[מֶלֶח מ]] Jos 12:21; ´[[ישְׁבֵי מ]] Jos 17:11 = Ju Jdg 1:27; ´[[מֵי מ]] Ju Jdg 5:19; ´[[בִּקְעַת מ]] Zec 12:11, 2Ch 35:22; —mod. Lejjûn (=Legio) Rob:BR ii. 329 f. 364 Bd:Pal 229.
